addQueueMrEnclave(bytes32,bytes32).details: Only the authority of the queue can set the mrEnclave

params.mrEnclave: The mrEnclave to set for the queue
params.queueId: The queueId to set the mrEnclave for

params.oracles: The initial set of oracles associated with the queue

returns._0: The queues associated with the queueId

params.queueId: The queueId to get the mrEnclaves for

returns._0: The mrEnclaves associated with the queue

params.oracles: The oracles to set for the queue
params.queueId: The queueId to set the oracles for

removeQueueMrEnclave(bytes32,bytes32).details: Only the authority of the queue can remove the mrEnclave

params.queueId: The queueId to remove the mrEnclave from

setQueueAuthority(bytes32,address).details: Only the authority of the queue can set a new authority

params.authority: The new authority to set for the queue
params.queueId: The queueId to set the authority for

setQueueConfig(bytes32,string,uint256,ui.details: Only the authority of the queue can set the config

params.fee: fee required to submit an update to the queue
params.minAttestations: minimum number of attestations required for adding an oracle the queue
params.name: name of the queue
params.oracleValidityLength: length of time an oracle is valid for
params.queueId: the queueId to set the config for
params.resultsMaxSize: maximum size of the results array for feeds
params.toleratedBlocksStaleness: The number of blocks a timestamp is allowed to be stale
params.toleratedTimestampDelta: default maximum staleness blocks for a valid feed result

addQueueMrEnclave(bytes32,bytes32).notice: Add an enclave measurement to a queue

getQueueMrEnclaves(bytes32).notice: Get the mrEnclaves associated with a queue

queueOverride(bytes32,bytes32[],(address.notice: Set the oracle queue manually (override the oracles array)

removeQueueMrEnclave(bytes32,bytes32).notice: Remove an enclave measurement from a queue

setQueueAuthority(bytes32,address).notice: Set the authority for a queue

setQueueConfig(bytes32,string,uint256,ui.notice: Set the config for a queue
